title: Great site with tons of old posters
content:
Hi  
I thought I’d share this with you:

[http://www.rare-posters.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202192011/http:/www.rare-posters.com/ "http://www.rare-posters.com")

tons of old posters!

enjoy:-)

alex

author: alexfjelldal

comments.content:
Thank you - I love some of those posters...
